modules.title: Selected Spectra (current is blue line, hoovering on the table row)

modules.richtext:
First select some points in the score plot using Alt+Draw. The selected spectra will be displayed in the spectra viewer below and their group in the table on the left.

 

Hovering over the items in the table highlight the current spectrum in blue.

 

Clicking on a variable in the spectra display (bottom) trigger the display of the current spectrum color coded using the correlation matrix provided from R.

 

Clicking on table element will re-draw the colored trace with the newly selected spectrum.

 

Double click on the spectra or scores will reset the zoom.
